newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: SOCCER-JOAO ALVES RETURNS AS BOAVISTA COACH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-JOAO ALVES RETURNS AS BOAVISTA COACH.

text.p: Former Portuguese international Joao Alves has been named Boavista coach, replacing Yugoslav Zoran Filipovic who quit after the team were thrashed 5-1 by Italy's Internazionale in the UEFA Cup on Tuesday.
Club officials said on Thursday Alves, who coached the Portuguese first division side in the 1986/87 and 1990/91 seasons, had signed a contract until the end of the 1997-98 season.
Alves was sacked by Spanish side Salamanca two months ago.
